description:
This module provides functions that perform different hash operations.
 For example, they compute MD5 and various SHA functions on either
 strings or binary. The result is the base64 encoded value of the hash.

functions.name: hash-binary
functions.signature: ($value as xs:base64Binary, $alg as xs:string) as xs:base64Binary external
functions.description:
This function computes a hash value of the binary form of the given
 base64Binary item, i.e. the item is base64-decoded before hashing.
functions.summary: This function computes a hash value of the binary form of the given base64Binary item, i.

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: The binary item to be hashed.

parameters.name: alg
parameters.description: The algorithm to use for this hashing operation. Supported algorithms are "md5", "sha1", and "sha256".

returns.description: The hash as xs:base64Binary of the provided binary

errors: <xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">hash:UNSUPPORTED-ALGORITHM if the given hash algorithm is not supported</xqdoc:error>

functions.name: hash
functions.signature: ($value as xs:string, $alg as xs:string) as xs:base64Binary external
functions.description:
This function computes a hash value of the string provided as parameter.
 The function expects the hash algorithm to be used as parameter.
functions.summary: This function computes a hash value of the string provided as parameter.

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: The string to be hashed.

parameters.name: alg
parameters.description: The algorithm to use for this hashing operation. Supported algorithms are "md5", "sha1", and "sha256".

returns.description: The hash as xs:base64binary of the provided string

errors: <xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">hash:UNSUPPORTED-ALGORITHM if the given hash algorithm is not supported</xqdoc:error>

functions.name: md5-binary
functions.description:
This function computes the MD5 hash value of the binary form of the given
 base64Binary item, i.e. the item is base64-decoded before hashing.
functions.summary: This function computes the MD5 hash value of the binary form of the given base64Binary item, i.

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: The binary item to hash.

returns.description: The MD5 hash of the provided binary.

functions.name: md5
functions.description: Computes the MD5 hash of the string provided as parameter.
functions.summary: Computes the MD5 hash of the string provided as parameter.

functions.name: sha1-binary
functions.description:
This function computes the SHA1 hash value of the binary form of the given
 base64Binary item, i.e. the item is base64-decoded before hashing.
functions.summary: This function computes the SHA1 hash value of the binary form of the given base64Binary item, i.

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: The binary item to hash.

returns.description: The base64 encoded SHA1 hash of the provided binary.

functions.name: sha1
functions.description: Computes the SHA1 hash of the string provided as parameter.
functions.summary: Computes the SHA1 hash of the string provided as parameter.
